name: Cheating
description: Gaining advantages through unauthorized game modifications, such as Kill Aura or X-Ray.

name: Griefing
description: Destroy or deface other players' buildings

name: Trolling
description: Building inappropriate things or intentionally behaving inappropriately towards other players

name: Ban Bypass
description: Bypassing a ban through a secondary account

name: Inappropriate skin/name
description: Using an inappropriate skin or name

name: Trading with real money
description: Exchange real money for items or activities
